title: Strengthening HR Management Practical Competencies: ICT Integration Strategy Design for University Education

context.prior_knowledge: Requirement of intermediate theoretical background and practical experience
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can design at least three methods to effectively deliver social science content using ICT tools.
In VR/simulation environments, learners can integrate and apply at least two digital collaboration tools during team-based projects.
Learners can develop project evaluation rubrics to measure the effectiveness of ICT-based learning activities.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
